name: Glenny The Zombie Astronaut
description:
You have one minute to kill enough mobs to summon the keeper and smash him. If you manage to do it before the timer ends, you'll have a chance to retry on a higher difficulty.
If not,  try again.
In both cases, do not forget to spend collected orbs into your stats to become beefier.

Controls:
Left/Right - A/D, arrow keys
Up - W, arrow key or spacebar
The character attacks automatically.

The web build's performance might be poor on low-end machines. I suggest trying a native build instead.

A jet-pack-powered side-scrolling rougelite game.  Initially inspired by Vampire Survivors, it now tries to combine good parts from other games like Diablo 3, Nordic Ashes.

The core gameplay and the first stage are still work in progress.

The goal is to have
* 3 stages
* 3 bosses (likely with variants)
* 5 enemy types with variants
* 4 base weapons with variants
* local Co-Op (hot seats)

Target platforms:
* PC (Windows, Mac, Linux)
* Mobile (iOS & Android)
* Web (if performance is good enough)

Last but not least - it's powered by the amazing DragonRuby Game Toolkit.
